57 namespace Teuchos {
58 
70 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
71 void symMatTripleProduct( ETransp transw, const ScalarType alpha, const SerialSymDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& A,
72  const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& W, SerialSymDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& B )
73 {
74  // Local variables.
75  // Note: dimemensions of W are obtained so we can compute W^T*A*W for either cases.
76  OrdinalType A_nrowcols = A.numRows(); // A is a symmetric matrix and is assumed square.
77  OrdinalType B_nrowcols = (ETranspChar[transw]!='N') ? W.numCols() : W.numRows();
78  OrdinalType W_nrows = (ETranspChar[transw]!='N') ? W.numRows() : W.numCols();
79  OrdinalType W_ncols = (ETranspChar[transw]!='N') ? W.numCols() : W.numRows();
80 
81  bool isBUpper = B.upper();
82 
83  // Check for consistent dimensions.
84  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( B_nrowcols != B.numRows(), std::out_of_range,
85  "Teuchos::symMatTripleProduct<>() : "
86  "Num Rows/Cols B (" << B.numRows() << ") inconsistent with W ("<< B_nrowcols << ")");
87  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( A_nrowcols != W_nrows, std::out_of_range,
88  "Teuchos::symMatTripleProduct<>() : "
89  "Num Rows/Cols A (" << A_nrowcols << ") inconsistent with W ("<< W_nrows << ")");
90 
91  // Scale by zero, initialized B to zeros and return.
92  if ( alpha == ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero() )
93  {
94  B.putScalar();
95  return;
96  }
97 
98  // Workspace.
99  SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> AW;
100 
101  // BLAS class.
102  BLAS<OrdinalType, ScalarType> blas;
103  ScalarType one = Teuchos::ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::one();
104  ScalarType zero = Teuchos::ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero();
105 
106  // Separate two cases because BLAS only supports symmetric matrix-matrix multply w/o transposes.
107  if (ETranspChar[transw]!='N') {
108  // Size AW to compute A*W
109  AW.shapeUninitialized(A_nrowcols,W_ncols);
110 
111  // A*W
112  AW.multiply( Teuchos::LEFT_SIDE, alpha, A, W, ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero() );
113 
114  // B = W^T*A*W
115  if (isBUpper) {
116  for (int j=0; j<B_nrowcols; ++j)
117  blas.GEMV( transw, W_nrows, j+1, one, W.values(), W.stride(), AW[j], 1, zero, &B(0,j), 1 );
118  }
119  else {
120  for (int j=0; j<B_nrowcols; ++j)
121  blas.GEMV( transw, W_nrows, B_nrowcols-j, one, W[j], W.stride(), AW[j], 1, zero, &B(j,j), 1 );
122  }
123  }
124  else {
125  // Size AW to compute W*A
126  AW.shapeUninitialized(W_ncols, A_nrowcols);
127 
128  // W*A
129  AW.multiply( Teuchos::RIGHT_SIDE, alpha, A, W, ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero() );
130 
131  // B = W*A*W^T
132  if (isBUpper) {
133  for (int j=0; j<B_nrowcols; ++j)
134  for (int i=0; i<=j; ++i)
135  blas.GEMV( transw, 1, A_nrowcols, one, &AW(i,0), AW.stride(), &W(j,0), W.stride(), zero, &B(i,j), 1 );
136  }
137  else {
138  for (int j=0; j<B_nrowcols; ++j)
139  for (int i=j; i<B_nrowcols; ++i)
140  blas.GEMV( transw, 1, A_nrowcols, one, &AW(i,0), AW.stride(), &W(j,0), W.stride(), zero, &B(i,j), 1 );
141  }
142  }
143 
144  return;
145 }

156 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
157 SerialDenseVector<OrdinalType,ScalarType>
158 getCol( DataAccess CV, SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& A, const OrdinalType col )
159 {
160  return SerialDenseVector<OrdinalType, ScalarType>(CV, A[col], A.numRows());
161 }
162 
172 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
173 bool setCol( const SerialDenseVector<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& v,
174  const OrdinalType col,
175  SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& A )
176 {
177  if (v.length() != A.numRows()) return false;
178 
179  std::copy(v.values(),v.values()+v.length(),A[col]);
180 
181  return true;
182 }
